channel.title: CVE Feed for kp4coder -- Sync Post With Other Site
channel.description: The latest CVEs for kp4coder -- Sync Post With Other Site

item.title: CVE-2024-32082|2024-08-02T02:06:43.890Z -- kp4coder -- sync%20post%20with%20other%20site
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in kp4coder Sync Post With Other Site allows Cross-Site Scripting (XSS).This issue affects Sync Post With Other Site: from n/a through 1.5.1.
